name: DeepSleepMeditation|ImproveSleepQuality
0:
”Alexa, open Deep Sleep Meditation”
”Alexa, start Deep Sleep Meditation”
”Alexa, launch Deep Sleep Meditation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deep sleep meditation
des:
If a racing mind is keeping you up at night, "Bedtime Meditation" might be just the sleep aid that you need. The mind-calming practice can be done at bedtime or any time during the day to help fight fatigue & insomnia.

"Bedtime Meditation" helps you learn how to let go of the stresses of the day. Think of it as exercising a muscle that gets stronger over time. This allows you to tap into that same ready relaxation state when it’s time to say goodnight.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

By default, Alexa will play the meditation of the day(selected randomly). To skip the meditation, just say, "Alexa, play next".

--> Basic guided meditations

- Mindful Yoga
- Yoga Nidra
- Relaxation and dreaming
- Mindfulness of breathing
- Bedtime meditation

--> Guided Meditations by Yeshe Rabgye

- Mindful Breathing Awareness
- Relaxing the Mind
- Befriending Yourself
- Compassion Awareness
- Come to Go Meditation
- Experience Stillness
- Facing Your Troubles
- Death Awareness
- Experiencing Gratitude
- Mindful Body Scan
- Mental vacation
- Letting Go of Your Anxiety
- Impermanence Awareness

--> Guided Meditations by Julie Blandon

- Yoga Deep Sleep Meditation

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! If you love "Deep Sleep Meditation | Improve Sleep Quality", please consider showing your support by writing a review for "Deep Sleep Meditation | Improve Sleep Quality".
